feed.title: Immich Public Proxy Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Immich Public Proxy: 1.2.0
entry.content:
Immich Public Proxy is now published as a docker container.

To install, just copy the docker-compose.yml file, and create yourself a .env file.

https://github.com/alangrainger/immich-public-proxy?tab=readme-ov-file#how-to-install-with-docker
